fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor

1.name: Fighting Style
1.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

1.name: Second Wind
1.description: You have a limited well of stamina. Once per short rest, you can use a bonus action to regain 1d10 + fighter level HP.

2.name: Action Surge
2.description: You can push yourself beyond your normal limits. Once per short rest, you can take one additional action on your turn.

3.name: Martial Archetype
3.description: You choose an archetype that represents your martial training and techniques.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies. Rogues rely on skill, stealth, and their foes' vulnerabilities to get the upper hand in any situation.

1.name: Sneak Attack
1.description: Once per turn, deal an extra 1d6 damage when you have advantage on the attack roll or when an ally is within 5 feet of the target.

1.name: Expertise
1.description: Choose two skills. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for those skills.

1.name: Thieves' Cant
1.description: You know thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code.

2.name: Cunning Action
2.description: You can take a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

3.name: Roguish Archetype
3.description: Choose an archetype (Thief, Assassin, Arcane Trickster).
